content:
Sure, here are five different scenarios that a guest commonly encounters at a restaurant that involve some interaction with the staff, listed as strings and stored in a Python list:
```python
restaurant_scenarios = [
    "Requesting to speak with a manager",
    "Asking for recommendations or suggestions",
    "Requesting a high chair or booster seat",
    "Asking for help with the menu or ordering process",
    "Asking for the restroom location or assistance"
]
```
